com.bitplan.simplegraph.core

Interface SimpleSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SimpleGraph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExcelSystem, FileSystem, GitHubSystem, HtmlSystem, JavaSystem, JsonSystem, MapSystem, MediaWikiSystem, PdfSystem, PowerPointSystem, SimpleSystemImpl, SmwSystem, SNMPSystem, SQLSystem, TripleStoreSystem, WikiDataSystem, WordSystem, XmlSystem

    public interface SimpleSystem
extends SimpleGraph
    a System that allows access to a graph that is wrapped by the system
    Author:
    wf
